item.title: Mannyverse Puzzle
The Mannyverse: A 3D Web3gl Game
item.description: Welcome to the Mannyverse. https://kintisbo.itch.io/mannyverse The Mannyverse is a custom world I built for a popular 3D NFT called Mannys.game. Mannys.game: An Intro Manny is a person. Manny is also a collection of non-fungible digital clones of Manny. The original NFT Manny created was released as a psycological game. He used a 3d body scan of himself as the token, modifying a select number to have a special characterstic (Zombie Manny, Inverted Manny, Silver Manny, etc.

item.title: One Token vs. Many Token
item.description: Both One Token and Many Token are under development and will be released soon! Stay tuned!

item.title: Takeaways From Learning Ethereum
item.description: Over the past few months, I have done a deep dive in to Solidity and Ethereum development. This has included some Web3, but the main focus has been on Solidity and ERC standards. Below is a short list of resources I used, as well as some brief takeaways. Resources I Used Nader Dabit. I cannot stress enough how phenomenal that guy is at teaching. Tutorials https://cryptozombies.

item.title: The Function of Supply: An ERC-20 Experiment in Minimum Transactable Value
item.description: An Experiment in the Supply of ERC-20 Tokens This is still a work in progress Abstract This “greypaper” serves to identify a little discussed issue. Popular tokens like Ethereum and Bitcoin, as they gain popularity, inch closer to a divisibility bomb in what I’ve dubbed “the Satoshi problem.” High market cap coins with limited supply and fixed divisibility will eventually experience a slowdown in the network when users are unable to micro-transact.
